snippet.title: Empire: Total War for Mac and Linux Launch trailer
snippet.description:
Command the seas, conquer the land, build an Empire.

An epic game of real-time tactics which combines turn-based empire building with massive 3D real-time battles on land and at sea. Empire: Total War and the Empire: Total War Collection are out now for Mac and Linux.

Find about more about Empire: Total War for Mac and Linux at the Steam information page:

http://www.feralinteractive.com/en/mac-games/empire/steam/

If you have any questions, ask us on Facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/feralinteractive

...or on Twitter:

https://twitter.com/feralgames
